sentence.Network_en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentence.Network_cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentence.Network_en: The seat was a stronghold of the Labour party.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个选区是工党的大本营。

sentence.Network_en: Shetland is the last stronghold of otters in the British Isles.
sentence.Network_cn: 设得兰群岛是水獭在不列颠群岛上最后的栖息地。

Iraqi and US forces raided the Shiite militia stronghold in Baghdad today ., 伊美两军今天突袭了巴格达什叶派民兵据点.
The robbers had a stronghold in the mountains ., 强盗们在山里有一个据点.

entry.tran: (持共同态度或信仰的人的)大本营，据点
entry.def: If you say that a place or region is a stronghold of a particular attitude or belief, you mean that most people there share this attitude or belief.

example.ex: The westernmost part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers...
example.tran: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

example.ex: The seat was a stronghold of the Labour party.
example.tran: 这个选区是工党的大本营。

entry.def: If you say that a place is a stronghold of a particular type of animal, you mean that more of that type of animal live there than in other places.

example.ex: Shetland is the last stronghold of otters in the British Isles.
example.tran: 设得兰群岛是水獭在不列颠群岛上最后的栖息地。
